    • Constructor Detail

      • RoundedRectButton

        public RoundedRectButton(processing.core.PApplet p,
                         float nx,
                         float ny,
                         float nw,
                         float nh,
                         java.lang.String ntext,
                         float curvature)
        Constructor for the RoundedRectButton class.
        Parameters:
        p - PApplet, the parent sketch of the object (usually "this")
        nx - float, the horizontal location of the center of this button
        ny - float, the vertical location of the center of this button
        nw - float, the horizontal length of this button
        nh - float, the vertical length of this button
        ntext - String, the string value of the name of this button
        curvature - float, the percent by which to curve the button's corners in

                         java.lang.String ntext,
                         float curvature)
        Constructor for the RoundedRectButton class.
        Parameters:
        p - PApplet, the parent sketch of the object (usually "this")
        nx - float, the horizontal location of the center of this button
        ny - float, the vertical location of the center of this button
        nw - float, the horizontal length of this button
        nh - float, the vertical length of this button
        ncolors - color, the colors used in this button
        ntext - String, the string value of the name of this button
        curvature - float, the percent by which to curve the button's corners in

      • RoundedRectButton

        public RoundedRectButton(processing.core.PApplet p,
                         float nx,
                         float ny,
                         float nw,
                         float nh,
                         int[] ncolors,
                         java.lang.String ntext)
        Constructor for the RoundedRectButton class. Uses a default amount of curvature.
        Parameters:
        p - PApplet, the parent sketch of the object (usually "this")
        nx - float, the horizontal location of the center of this button
        ny - float, the vertical location of the center of this button
        nw - float, the horizontal length of this button
        nh - float, the vertical length of this button
        ncolors - color, the colors used in this button
        ntext - String, the string value of the name of this button
